articles.title: Kim Jong Un Watches Basketball Game of DPRK, American Players
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Watches Basketball Game of DPRK, American Players
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- A basketball game was played by the American basketball team of ex-NBA stars and Korean players of the Hwaebul team of the DPRK at Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Wednesday. The American team is now on a visit to the DPRK for sports exchange.
					 The match was watched by sports fans, people from all walks of life and youth and students.
					
					 Among the spectators were foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international bodies, military attaches and their wives, staff members of various embassies, foreign guests and overseas Koreans staying in the motherland.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un came out to the stadium together with Ri Sol Ju to watch the game.
					
					 He was warmly greeted by Dennis Rodman, American ex-NBA star.
					
					 Kim Jong Un welcomed the American basketball players' visit to the DPRK and said that the game served as a good occasion in promoting the understanding between the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 Rodman presented Kim Jong Un with a gift he prepared with the deepest respect for him. 
					
					 In his speech made before the match, he said he felt the Korean people were respecting Kim Jong Un while staying in the DPRK.
					
					 He sang a song reflecting his reverence for Kim Jong Un, touching the spectators. 
					
					 The first two rounds of the match were held between Hwaebul Team of the DPRK and the team of ex-NBA stars and its last two rounds were played as a mixed game of players of the two countries. 
					
					 Dennis Rodman also played in the match, revving it up.
					
					 The Hwaebul Team beat the team of ex-NBA stars 47:39 and the White Team trounced the Green Team 63: 54.
					
					 Commemorative cups and medals were awarded to the players of the two teams.
					
					 At the end of the match, Kim Jong Un met the players of the two teams.
					
					 Kim Jong Un said he watched a good match and wished the American basketball players pleasant days in the DPRK.
					
					 He had a photo taken with the American basketball players. 
					
					Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and Kang Sok Ju watched the match together with their wives.

articles.title: Election of Deputies to SPA to Be Held
articles.content:
Election of Deputies to SPA to Be Held
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) decided to hold an election of deputies to the 13th SPA on March 9, Juche 103 (2014), according to Article 90 of the Socialist Constitution of the DPRK.
					 The decision was promulgated on Tuesday.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Opt for Mending Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Opt for Mending Inter-Korean Relations 
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) on January 5 made public a statement urging the south Korean puppet authorities to opt for mending the inter-Korean relations.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address called for establishing a favorable climate for improved relations between the north and the south. 
					
					 However, the south Korean authorities have said from the outset of the year that the north should show sincerity for building confidence for improved relations between the south and the north and that the north should make sincere efforts for denuclearization. They let loose a whole string of invectives laying the blame for the strained situation at the door of the north, far from creating a favorable climate for mending the relations. 
					
					 They hurled troops of the puppet army into shelling drill, maneuvers, position-occupying drill, etc., chilling the desire of all Koreans for the north-south reconciliation and unity. 
					
					 All these moves once again clearly indicate who sincerely hopes for national unity and reunification and who insists on confrontation and permanent division. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop at once the smear campaign and confrontation which bring nothing good to the nation and make sincere efforts for national reconciliation, unity and reunification.

articles.title: More Meetings Held in Provinces, City
articles.content:
More Meetings Held in Provinces, City
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in South Phyongan, South and North Hamgyong provinces and Rason City on Wednesday to vow to thoroughly carry out the important tasks supreme leader Kim Jong Un set forth in his New Year Address.
					 Present there were officials of local party, power and economic organs, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, farms and universities, working people, youth and students.
					
					 Reporters and speakers said that Kim Jong Un's New Year Address serves as a banner instilling the conviction of future and revolutionary self-esteem into all service personnel and people and as important guidelines indicating the shortcut to bringing about a new leap forward and innovations.
					
					 They underscored the need to keep up agriculture as a major thrust, introduce scientific farming methods, do farm work in a responsible manner and thus bring about a decisive turn in the agricultural production.
					
					 They called upon the service personnel and the people to make concerted efforts to consolidate the foundation of the independent economy, dynamically push ahead with construction projects to provide the people with affluent and modern living conditions and thoroughly ensure the quality of structures.
					
					 They also called upon scientists and technicians to make great scientific and technological achievements upholding the party's leadership.
					
					 They underlined the need to bring about a new turn in the educational work, put efforts to medical treatment and preventive medicine and ensure that the benefits of socialist healthcare system reach the people more closely.
					
					  They underscored the need to meticulously manage the country's economy with a strong sense of patriotism and attitude as befitting masters and at the same time protect and increase the country's priceless natural resources and cover all the mountains with thick forests.

articles.title: New Poems, Songs Created in DPRK
articles.content:
New Poems, Songs Created in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Poets of the Central Committee of the Writers Union of Korea have created 20-odd poems and songs to arouse the people to a drive for carrying out the tasks set forth by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 The poems and songs represent the will of servicepersons and civilians to surely build a thriving nation by raising a fierce wind of making a fresh leap forward with their indomitable courage. They also show the army and people's firm resolve to make signal successes this year under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Meanwhile, the poets are conducting agitation activities at the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex and other industrial establishments to encourage their employees to bring about a fresh production upswing.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Famous Work on Settling Rural Question in DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Famous Work for Settling Rural Question in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- It was 50 years ago that President Kim Il Sung made pubic his famous work "Theses on the Socialist Rural Question in Our Country".
					 The work was published on February 25, 1964.
					
					 In the work, Kim Il Sung gave full answers to all questions arising in the socialist rural construction including the essence and content of the socialist rural question as well as the principles and ways for its successful settlement.
					
					 The theses have served as guidelines for rural communities in the country to steadily advance along the road of socialism for the past 50 years.
					
					 The three revolutions -- ideological, technical and cultural -- have been continuously carried on in rural areas to fully equip the agricultural workers with the Juche idea, Songun (military-first) idea of the Workers' Party of Korea, thus consolidating the politico-ideological, material and technical foundations of rural areas.
					
					 The comprehensive mechanization of agriculture has made brisk headway in step with irrigation projects. And all farmlands across the country turned into fields of standardized shapes.
					
					 Rural areas took on new looks as befitting the socialist fairyland and the management of rural economy has been steadily improved to further consolidate its foundations.
					
					 All these successes are the brilliant fruition of the theses. They are also ascribable to the great devotion of leader Kim Jong Il, who made all efforts to carry into reality the President's idea on socialist rural construction.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address underlined the need to clearly prove the validity and vitality of the theses by waging the ideological, technological and cultural revolutions dynamically in the rural areas and bringing about a decisive turn in agricultural production.
					
					 Now Kim Jong Un is devoting his all to bringing earlier the rosy future for rural areas.
					
					 Thanks to his energetic leadership, the lofty idea of the President on rural construction will surely come true.

articles.title: Efforts for Raising Electricity Production in DPRK
articles.content:
Efforts for Raising Electricity Production in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Officials and workers in the power industrial field of the DPRK have turned out in a drive to carry out the tasks set forth by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year address.
					 They are now concentrating efforts on the technical improvement for increasing electricity output.
					
					 The Pukchang Thermal Power Complex launched a brisk mass technological innovation movement to remodel fans of feed pumps and other kinds of equipment, while the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex introduced several technical innovations like a system for protection of pumping equipment.
					
					 The Sunchon Thermal Power Plant is raising the operation rate of its equipment in close touch with a scientific institute and the Kanggye Youth Power Station put the operation of several electric governors and exciters on an intelligent basis.
					
					 Hochongang, Jangjingang and other power stations replaced water turbines with efficient ones and developed new vanes.
					
					 Meanwhile, efforts are directed to the construction of more transformer substations to increase the electric power supply capacity.
					
					 Minor hydraulic power stations throughout the country are keeping their equipment in good condition, while making an effective use of water resources.

articles.title: DPRK People Study Supreme Leader's New Year Address
articles.content:
DPRK People Study Supreme Leader's New Year Address
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- People in the DPRK are now intensifying the study of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address, which calls for raising a fierce wind of making a fresh leap forward on all fronts of building a thriving country.
					 Officials of the ministries and national institutions set it as their overriding work for this year to fully grasp ideas and contents carried in the New Year Address.
					
					 Those of the Ministry of Agriculture are conducting the study of the address in various forms and ways, with stress put on the part that calls for keeping up agriculture as a major thrust of this year's struggle and concentrating efforts on farming.
					
					 Such atmosphere of studying the New Year Address can be seen everywhere in the country, including provincial, city and county party committees and people's committees, industrial establishments and co-op farms.
					
					 Seminars on the address are held at working sites during breaks, and people of different social strata are seen avidly reading newspapers carrying the address in tram cars, buses and public places.
					
					 TV, radio and other media have frequently reported the full text of the New Year Address or articles explaining it to help the people in their study. 
					
					 Ri Ung Il, chairman of the youth league committee of Kim Il Sung University, told KCNA:
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un's New Year Address serves as guidelines and the banner of eternal prosperity of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 We are making a deep study of the address to grasp his idea, will and intention.

articles.title: Schoolchildren's New Year Performance Enjoys Popularity
articles.content:
Schoolchildren's New Year Performance Enjoys Popularity
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- "Snow Is Falling on New Year's Day" is one of the songs put on the stage at the Schoolchildren's New Year performance now under way here.
					 The song instills into the audience ardent yearning for the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who had shown boundless loving care for children in their lifetime.
					
					 Kim Il Sung had enjoyed children's New Year performances for scores of years since he took part in a New Year's meeting with children at his ordinary residence at the foot of Mt. Haebang. 
					
					 He saw the children's New Year performances every year held at monumental edifices in Pyongyang City, including the Taedongmun Cinema, Pyongyang Students and Children's Palace, Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and the April 25 House of Culture.
					
					 Through those performances, the people of the DPRK have felt thankful to the Generalissimos for setting up children as king of the country.
					
					 Indeed, the schoolchildren's New Year performances have not been simple art performances but the moments of deepening the feelings of kinship between the leader and younger generations.
					
					 Kim Il Sung had always applauded the successful performances given by the children ahead of others and had photo sessions with them.
					
					 Under the guidance of leader Kim Jong Il, their New Year performance developed into a peculiar one involving not only schoolchildren but also people from all walks of life.
					
					 Now the Generalissimos' noble outlook on the younger generation has been carried forward by supreme leader Kim Jong Un, who always wishes the children happiness.
					
					 Thanks to the boundless loving care of the great Generalissimos and the warm blessings of Kim Jong Un, a rosy future is in store for the children in the DPRK.

articles.title: Independent Reunification of Korea Urged
articles.content:
Independent Reunification of Korea Urged
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, in his New Year Address called for rejecting outside forces and adhering to the standpoint of By Our Nation Itself in order to settle the issue of the country's reunification as desired by the Koreans.
					 Maintaining the idea of By Our Nation Itself is essential to strengthening the movement for Korea's reunification and improving the north-south relations.
					
					 This idea was advanced at the June 15 joint declaration adopted between the north and the south of Korea in 2000 and since then, the reunification movement has made big strides on the right track of national independence.
					
					 The anti-U.S. independence sentiments mounted in south Korea and all the fellow countrymen at home and abroad, including workers, peasants, students and religionists, pooled their will and efforts for national reconciliation and cooperation, glorifying the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 Dialogues between the north and the south turned into substantial ones producing good results for the interests common to the nation. Railways and roads which had been severed for more than half a century were reconnected between the two sides, bringing great delight to the nation.
					
					 After all, the reunification movement developed into a nationwide movement involving all Koreans, irrespective of differences in ideology, political view and religious belief.
					
					 The facts show that what is essential to advancing the reunification movement is to reject outside forces and pool the efforts of the north and the south in settling the national issue as required by the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 All Koreans are determined to achieve the reunification of the country independently in keeping with the national interests and demand by holding fast to the standpoint of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Stand by Nation's Security, Peace: News Analysis
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Stand by Nation's Security, Peace: News Analysis
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address declared a steadfast will of the DPRK Government to make consistent efforts for the detente on the Korean Peninsula, improved inter-Korean relations, peace and national reunification.  
					 The address is fully supported by all Koreans at home and abroad as it clearly reflects their desire for the security and peace of the nation. 
					
					 The Korean nation has suffered the tragedy of national division for so long time, being exposed to danger of war. 
					
					 The outside forces' persistent ambition for invasion of Korea plunged the Korean nation into a holocaust of the war in the 1950s. And now the war moves of bellicose forces at home and abroad force it to live under the threat of war in the world's biggest hotspot for nearly 70 years.
					
					 South Korea has now turned into the world's biggest nuclear arsenal, a hotbed of nuclear war in the 21st century. The continuous military exercises for a nuclear war against the DPRK precipitate a perilous situation where any accidental military skirmish may lead to an all-out war. 
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that if the DPRK failed to restrain itself at a time when the situation on the Korean Peninsula went from bad to worse, the Korean Peninsula might have been reduced into a land of horrible disaster and misfortune.
					
					 Should another war break out on this land, it will result in a nuclear holocaust and no one will go unharmed.
					
					 It is hard for the Korean people to continue standing the long tragedy of the national division forced upon them by the outside forces, but if another war is forced upon them, it will bring catastrophic disasters to them.
					
					 For the Korean nation, nothing is more precious than the security and peace and their desire for them are stronger than any others.
					
					 The escalation of tensions on the Korean Peninsula is laying hurdles only in achieving national reconciliation and unity and the country's security and peaceful reunification. 
					
					 Any Korean can remain a passive onlooker to the nation's destiny at risk. 
					
					 All the Korean people should not tolerate but resolutely frustrate the confrontational and war moves of the bellicose forces at home and abroad. 
					
					 Those who are worried over the destiny of the nation should turn out in the effort for defending peace, irrespective of their political tendency and affiliation.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should ponder over the north-south Korean relations from the honest viewpoint of the nation's security and peace.

articles.title: Anti-"Government" Actions Mount in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-"Government" Actions Mount in S. Korea 
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Protest actions are gaining in scope and strength in south Korea against the puppet government authorities extremely straining the north-south relations through a reckless campaign to eliminate the "followers of the north". 
					 The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea denounced the authorities for making no scruple of perpetrating such acts of bedeviling the inter-Korean relations as kicking up a campaign to eliminate "followers of the north" and opening the minutes of the south-north summit to public in a bid to cover up the truth behind the fraudulent election staged with all power bodies involved and evade the responsibility for it. 
					
					 The Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy, the South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), the Association of Victims of "National Security Law" and other civic and public organizations condemned the authorities for labeling those protesting against the unpopular rule "followers of the north" and resorting to indiscriminate suppression of the reunification movement. 
					
					 The People's Solidarity for the Repeal of the "National Security Law", the Measure Committee to Denounce the Intelligence Service's Fabrication of Attempted Rebellion and Suppression under the Pretext of Security, the Civic and Public Joint Measure Committee for Coping with Suppression of Pomminryon and others in south Korea rapped the authorities for kicking up a campaign to eliminate "followers of the north" on charges of violation of the NSL and  expressed the will to turn out in the struggle for checking it.
					
					 The Unified Progressive Party, the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and other political parties and organizations at their meetings disclosed the gravity of the authorities' reckless campaign and called upon the people of different social standings to turn out in actions against it.
					
					 People from all walks of life in South and North Jolla provinces made public declarations on the situation in protest against the criminal acts of the authorities. This action is now sweeping across south Korea. 
					
					 Religionists are also staging widespread actions in protest against the above-said campaign of the authorities. 
					
					 The Association of Theological Students for Democracy made up of different students organizations of theological institutes held a mass on the situation at which they declared they would escalate the movement for issuing declarations on the situation. 
					
					 Media lambasted the authorities for driving the south-north relations to the worst phase through the said campaign, much upset by the daily expanding movement demanding the resignation of the regime in the wake of the recent disclosure of the truth about the election fraud.

articles.title: Elimination of Dictatorial Forces Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Elimination of Dictatorial Forces Urged in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- South Korean internet newspaper Voice of People in an editorial Monday called for eliminating the dictatorial forces hell-bent on tampering with history.
					 The editorial referred to the fact that the distorted history textbooks which were supposed to be used by the present regime and "Saenuri Party" for education are rejected at schools.
					
					 This is a stern punishment meted out by south Koreans to the present conservative ruling forces that have worked hard to embellish the erstwhile dictators, it said.
					
					 It accused the Park Geun Hye regime of getting frantic with the moves to produce distorted history textbooks while terming the textbooks which give proper understanding to the readers the Left ones.
					
					 The regime also suppressed the Teachers Union by labeling it as "illegal union" for the mere reason that it protested against the textbooks beautifying flunkeyism and fascist dictatorship, it noted, adding:
					
					 The conservative forces removed wall papers disclosing the authorities' distortion of history and closed websites of schools as part of their crackdown on the just struggle of students. This proved itself they are descendants of the dictatorial regime.
					
					 The act of tampering with history will never be stopped unless dictators are eliminated, it warned.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive Urged to Step Down
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive Urged to Step Down
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The religionists of the Suwon Catholic Parish in south Korea Monday held a mass on the situation in Hwasong, Kyonggi Province urging the regime to step down for its election rigging.
					 It has become clear that the Intelligence Service, the military and other power bodies interfered in the 2012 election, the speakers noted. Nevertheless, the regime is suppressing people after labeling them "followers of the north" for the mere reason that they demanded it make a thorough-going investigation of the election rigging and punish its mastermind.
					
					 Moreover, the regime is turning down the people's demand for their right to existence and distorting history while hurling police forces into brutally putting down the demands made by the people in distress, they said, and adding:
					
					 It is natural for the "president" to step down as she was elected through frauds.

articles.title: Actions against Regime's Tyrannical Rule Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions against Regime's Tyrannical Rule Called for in S. Korea 
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification released an article on the New Year.
					 Now is the time for all people to turn out in all-out actions to check the revival of the "yusin" dictatorship, the article noted.
					
					 It called on them to launch a resolute struggle for defending human rights and democracy against the regime's intensified suppression this year.
					
					 There would be no end to the regime's moves to deteriorate the people's living, it declared, calling upon people from all walks of life to get united and protect their living at any cost from the tyrannical rule of the regime.
					
					 It underscored the need for all forces desirous of progress to intensify solidarity actions.

articles.title: Koreans in China Urge S. Korean Authorities to Make Correct Option
articles.content:
Koreans in China Urge S. Korean Authorities to Make Correct Option
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China released a statement titled "The south Korean authorities should make correct option" on Jan. 5.
					 The statement said:
					
					 This year marks 20 years since President Kim Il Sung signed the last historic document related to the national reunification.
					
					 The New Year Address of Marshal Kim Jong Un called for making fresh advance in the movement of national reunification, bringing great delight and hope to all Koreans.
					
					 The south Koreans and the progressive media and even conservative media gave wide publicity to the New Year Address and even politicians welcomed it.
					
					 But only the south Korean authorities are zealously kicking up the racket of escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen, while hurling a whole gamut of slanders and calumnies.
					
					 This clearly reveals their intention to quench the ever-growing desire for improving the north-south relations and implementing north-south joint declarations and to leave the destiny of the nation to the tender mercy of outsiders this year, too.
					
					 The General Association vehemently denounces in the name of all Koreans in China the south Korean authorities for answering the efforts of good faith for reconciliation with moves of bad faith for confrontation.
					
					  The south Korean authorities should make a correct option, well aware that Koreans who are all out in their dynamic general advance for national reunification for this year are watching them.

articles.title: Koreans in Ukraine Demand S. Korean Authorities Opt for National Cooperation
articles.content:
Koreans in Ukraine Demand S. Korean Authorities Opt for National Cooperation 
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Sul, chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Ukraine, in a statement on Jan. 5 demanded the south Korean authorities opt for improving relations with the north.
					 The statement said the United Confederation fully supports the New Year Address made by Marshal Kim Jong Un in which he called for maintaining the principle of independence specified in the three principles of national reunification and the north-south joint declarations, taking the firm standpoint of By our nation itself, preserving nation's security and peace and creating an atmosphere for improving the north-south ties.
					
					 It is the vital task of the times not to tolerate any more discord and antagonism but to achieve national reconciliation and ensure the peace on the Korean Peninsula, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The south Korean authorities should clearly face up to the situation, away from confrontational megalomania.
					
					 They should opt for cooperation with the nation, not with outsiders, and readily come out for reconciliation and co-existence with sincerity before talking about other's "sincerity".
					
					 All the Koreans abroad will make active contributions to the patriotic movement for mending the north-south ties and ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by British Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by British Organization on Its Website 
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Further Strengthen the Socialist System of Our Country" was posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on its website on Dec. 24 last year.
					 The work, made public on December 25, Juche 61 (1972), clarifies the struggle of the DPRK government for the socialist revolution and construction, the advantages of the socialist system and the main contents of the Socialist Constitution of the DPRK and the tasks to steadily develop the socialist system.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Posted on Websites
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Posted on Websites
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address was posted on websites by political party, organizations and institutions of different countries and regional organization from Jan. 1 to 3. 
					 The "Communists of Russia" Party posted on its website the full text of Kim Jong Un's New Year Address for 2014 accompanied with his photo acknowledging the cheers of the crowd from the tribune of honor of Kim Il Sung Square.
					
					 The Moscow Workers' Union, Anti-Globalization Movement, Group for Solidarity with the DPRK and Rostov Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia, Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK, Anti-Imperialist Forum and MS Travel Agency of Germany, National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo and the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions posted on their websites the full text of the same address illustrated with his photo.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea, British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the Anti-Imperialist Front of France posted the full text of the same address on their websites.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Indian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Indian Figure
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Suneet Chopra, member of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of India (Marxist) and secretary general of All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association, made public a statement on Jan. 3 in support of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 He positively supported the New Year Address of Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, in which he indicated the way for building a thriving nation and defending socialism.
					
					 The great achievements made by the Workers' Party of Korea, the Korean People's Army and all the Korean people last year showed the will of the Korean people to consolidate the political and ideological position of the revolutionary ranks with their leader as the center, safeguard the national sovereignty and dignity by dint of powerful military muscle and accomplish the cause of building a thriving nation united close around the leader, he said, and went on:
					
					 Songun politics is a motive force encouraging the party, army and people of the DPRK to overcome all difficulties with faith in victory. 
					
					 The daily growing might of the DPRK convinces the Korean people of the justice of their cause of socialism.
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to defend the sovereignty, dignity and peace of the country and achieve its independent and peaceful reunification free from foreign interference.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Lauded in India, Uganda
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Lauded in India, Uganda
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on December 30 last year on the occasion of the second anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 They included a seminar in India and a photo and book exhibition and film show in Uganda.
					
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were photos dealing with the Songun leadership exploits of leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were photos and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Participants in the film show watched Korean film "Arms of Korea".
					
					 The secretary general of the Indian Society for Juche Idea Self-Reliance Studies said in his speech that Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the KPA serves as an event of epochal significance in accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, the revolutionary cause of Songun, and it is a great fortune of the Korean people.
					
					 The secretary general went on:
					
					 The DPRK has won victory in the confrontation with the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces as it is led by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Korean people will build a thriving socialist nation and achieve the reunification of the country without fail under his seasoned leadership.
					
					 The chairman of the Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea noted that socialism of the DPRK has advanced victoriously despite all trials and difficulties. This would be unthinkable without the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the chairman added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Foreign Personages
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Personages of Nigeria and Myanmar released statements on January 1 in support of the New Year Address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 Alhassan Mamman Muhammad, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said Kim Jong Un's New Year Address is instilling conviction of certain victory and optimism into not only the Korean people but also other progressive people.
					
					 He expressed conviction that the Workers' Party Korea (WPK) and the Korean people will make brilliant successes in the building of a thriving socialist nation and win a proud victory in their efforts to reunify the country and carry out the global cause of independence under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un in this significant year.
					
					 Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, said the New Year Address made by Kim Jong Un serves as a banner to be held fast to by the WPK and the DPRK government and people this year, adding:
					
					 The New Year Address reflects the immutable will of the WPK and the DPRK government to build a thriving nation without fail with their own idea, by their own efforts and in their own way, true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It is entirely just that Kim Jong Un called for rejecting outside forces and holding fast to the standpoint of By Korean Nation Itself.
					
					 The Korean people will build a thriving nation and reunify the country under his leadership as desired by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The director in his statement extended best wishes to Kim Jong Un and firm support and solidarity to the Korean people's just cause.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by British Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- British organizations released statements on December 24 and 30 last year on the occasion of the second anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said in a joint statement that Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the KPA is an expression of absolute support and trust of the Korean people in him and a reflection of their strong will to invariably advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism under his Songun revolutionary leadership in any storm and stress.
					
					 The statement praised him for developing the Korean revolutionary armed forces into an invincible army through his energetic inspection of KPA units.
					
					 The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association in a statement noted:
					
					 Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the KPA is not only the behest of leader Kim Jong Il but also a reflection of the unanimous desire of the Korean people to uphold his Songun revolutionary leadership generation after generation.
					
					 In the past two years Kim Jong Un has further developed the KPA into the invincible revolutionary armed forces and resolutely frustrated all provocations of the U.S. imperialists, assuming the heavy responsibility as supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 It is our greatest honor to extend congratulations to him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia juego de baloncesto de jugadores de RPDC y EE.UU.
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia juego de baloncesto de jugadores de RPDC y EE.UU.
						
Pyongyang, 8 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang el juego de baloncesto entre el equipo de estrellas compuesto por los ex jugadores de la Asociacion Nacional de Baloncesto (NBA en ingles) de Estados Unidos, que realiza una visita a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea para el intercambio de deporte, y el otro coreano Hwaebul.
					Para verlo concurrieron ahi los aficionados al deporte, trabajadores de diversos estratos, jovenes, estudiantes, matrimonios de los representantes diplomaticos, de organizaciones internacionales y de agregados militares, miembros de embajadas acreditados en Corea, huespedes extranjeros y compatriotas en ultramar.
					
					El Mariscal llego al palacio junto con Ri Sol Ju.
					
					El fue acogido calidamente por Dennis Rodman, ex jugador de NBA.
					
					Dio bienvenida a los jugadores norteamericanos y dijo que el presente partido sirve de motivo magnifico que promueve el entendimiento entre los pueblos de los dos paises.
					
					Rodman dirigio regalo lleno de sinceridad al Mariscal en reflejo de su infinita veneracion.
					
					Antes del inicio del partido, el destaco que durante su estancia aqui se sintio de que el pueblo coreano estima mucho al Mariscal.
					
					Canto en tono lleno de respeto y veneracion hacia el Mariscal emocionando a los espectadores.
					
					Ese dia, el juego se realizo dividido en cuatro rounds: primeros dos rounds entre el equipo coreano Hwaebul y el otro norteamericano compuesto por estrellas de NBA y otros dos rounds, entre los equipos mixtos.
					
					Tambien Rodman participo en el partido llevando al climax el clima del juego.
					
					Al final, el equipo coreano vencio al norteamericano por 47:39 y el equipo blanco doblego al verde por 63:54.
					
					Se otorgaron copas y medallas conmemorativas a los jugadores de los dos equipos.
					
					Concluido el partido, el Mariscal se reunio con los jugadores de ambos equipos.
					
					Apunto que vio juego maravilloso y deseo que durante su permanencia los jugadores norteamericanos pasen dias agradables.
					
					El Mariscal se fotografio junto a los jugadores norteamericanos.
					
					Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y Kang Sok Ju vieron el juego junto con sus esposas.

articles.title: Resolucion sobre elecciones de diputados a la APS de RPDC

Resolucion sobre elecciones de diputados a la APS de RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 8 de enero (ACNC) -- Quedo publicada el dia 7 la resolucion del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de realizar el 9 de marzo del 103 (2014) de la Era Juche las elecciones de los diputados a la XIII legislatura de la APS segun el capitulo 90 de la Constitucion Socialista de la RPDC.

articles.title: Continuan mitines en respuesta al mensaje del Ano Nuevo de Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Continuan mitines en respuesta al mensaje del Ano Nuevo de Kim Jong Un 
						
Pyongyang, 8 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 8 en las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur, de Hamgyong del Sur y del Norte y la ciudad de Rason los mitines multitudinarios para materializar las tareas importantes presentadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo.
					Estuvieron presentes los funcionarios, trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes de las instituciones del partido, el Poder y economia, entidades de masas, fabricas, empresas, granjas e institutos superiores de las respectivas localidades. 
					
					Los oradores destacaron que el mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Mariscal sirve de bandera estimulante y guia programatica que infunde a todos los militares y civiles la conviccion en la victoria y la dignidad revolucionaria e ilumina el atajo para lograr nuevos saltos e innovaciones. 
					
					Subrayaron la necesidad de registrar el cambio decisivo en la produccion agricola considerando la agricultura como sector de mayor prioridad, aplicando los metodos cientificos de cultivo y realizando con responsabilidad las faenas agricolas. 
					
					Insistieron en consolidar las bases de la economia independiente con operaciones conjuntas entre el ejercito y el pueblo, impulsar las obras de construccion para ofrecer al pueblo las condiciones de vida mas rica y culta y asegurar la calidad de construccion. 
					
					Los cientificos y tecnicos deben lograr buenos exitos cientificos y tecnicos siguiendo fielmente la direccion del Partido, dijeron y agregaron que se debe lograr nuevos cambios en la educacion y concentrar la fuerza en la profilaxis y tratamiento para que los habitantes se beneficien mejor del sistema de salud publica socialista. 
					
					Senalaron que se debe organizar bien la vida economica del pais con el patriotismo y la posicion de dueno, proteger y aumentar los preciosos recursos naturales del pais y crear bosques frondosos en todas las montanas.

articles.title: Mitines en varias provincias en respuesta al mensaje de Ano Nuevo
articles.content:
Mitines en varias provincias en respuesta al mensaje de Ano Nuevo
						
Pyongyang, 8 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar los dias 6 y 7 en las provincias de Phyong-an del Norte, de Hwanghae del Sur y el Norte, de Jagang y de Ryanggang los mitines de las masas para materializar las tareas programaticas presentadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el mensaje del Ano Nuevo.
					Estuvieron presentes los funcionarios, trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes de las instituciones del partido, el Poder y economia, las entidades de masas, fabricas, empresas, granjas y universidades de respectivas localidades.
					
					Hubo informes e intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores destacaron la necesidad de hacer el presente de un ano de impetuosa lucha y grandes cambios al materializar las tareas programaticas indicadas en el  mensaje y prosiguieron:
					
					Los funcionarios y trabajadores de la rama agricola deben registrar nuevo cambio en la produccion agricola del ano en curso en que se cumplira el 50o aniversario de la publicacion de la Tesis sobre el Problema Rural Socialista por  el Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					Hay que desplegar de manera ambiciosa la labor por realizar el grandioso proyecto de construccion del partido y asegurar en el nivel maximo la calidad de los edificios al manifestar la abnegacion patriotica.
					
					Es preciso obtener muchos exitos cientifico-tecnicos que contribuyan al desarrollo economico y la mejora de vida del pueblo al concentrar la mayor fuerza en el desarrollo de ciencias y tecnicas, establecer en toda la sociedad el ambiente de dar prioridad a ciencias y tecnicas y acelerar la labor de formar a todo el pueblo como talentosos  cientificos y tecnicos.
					
					Se debe acelerar la modernizacion del proceso productivo en las fabricas y empresas, aumentar la produccion movilizando las reservas internas y las posibilidades y mejorar decisivamente la  direccion y la administracion sobre la labor economica.
					
					Hace falta establecer estrictamente el ambiente de dar prioridad a los asuntos militares y apoyar activamente al Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Se debe frustrar tajantemente cualesquier tentativas de agresion de los enemigos y defender fidedignamente la patria al intensificar por todos los medios la gran unidad del ejercito y pueblo.
